info.title: BlueprintClient
info.description: Azure Blueprints Client provides access to blueprint definitions, assignments, and artifacts, and related blueprint operations.

get.description: List blueprint assignments within a subscription.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

put.description: Create or update a blueprint assignment.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.

nextLink.description: Link to the next page of results.

excludedPrincipals.description: List of AAD principals excluded from blueprint locks. Up to 5 principals are permitted.

AssignmentLockSettings.description: Defines how resources deployed by a blueprint assignment are locked.

blueprintId.description: ID of the published version of a blueprint definition.

AssignmentProperties.description: Detailed properties for a blueprint assignment.

managedResources.description: List of resources that were created by the blueprint assignment.

AssignmentStatus.description: The status of a blueprint assignment. This field is readonly.

id.description: String Id used to locate any resource on Azure.

AzureResourceBase.description: Common properties for all Azure resources.

BlueprintResourcePropertiesBase.description: Shared properties between all blueprint resources.

lastModified.description: Last modified time of this blueprint definition.

timeCreated.description: Creation time of this blueprint definition.

BlueprintResourceStatusBase.description: Shared status properties between all blueprint resources.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

tenantId.description: ID of the Azure Active Directory.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user-assigned managed identities associated with the resource. Key is the Azure resource Id of the managed identity.

ParameterValue.description: Value for the specified parameter. Can be either 'value' or 'reference' but not both.

ParameterValueCollection.description: A dictionary for parameters and their corresponding values.

ResourceGroupValueCollection.description: A dictionary which maps resource group placeholders to the resource groups which will be created.

secretVersion.description: The version of the secret to use. If left blank, the latest version of the secret is used.

SecretValueReference.description: Reference to a Key Vault secret.

location.description: The location of this blueprint assignment.

TrackedResource.description: Common properties for all Azure tracked resources.

clientId.description: Client App Id associated with this identity.

principalId.description: Azure Active Directory principal ID associated with this Identity.

objectId.description: AAD object Id of the Azure Blueprints service principal in the tenant.

WhoIsBlueprintContract.description: Response schema for querying the Azure Blueprints service principal in the tenant.

id.description: Azure resource ID of the Key Vault.

keyVaultReference.description: Specifies the link to a Key Vault.

ScopeParameter.name: scope
ScopeParameter.description: The scope of the resource. Valid scopes are: management group (format: '/providers/Microsoft.Management/managementGroups/{managementGroup}'), subscription (format: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}'). For blueprint assignments management group scope is reserved for future use.
